feature.label: GSEA Library App
feature.description:
This App allows you to run GSEA (Gene Set Enrichment Analysis) directly from within Blast2GO.
This App contains the libraries and executables needed to run GSEA. Remember: you need to install this App to be able to use GSEA.
feature.license: This App is based on the command-line version of Java GSEA (GSEA jar) which is available uder the GNU Lesser General Public Licence (LGPL). https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.txt
